Function reference

All functions

AnalyzAIRR
AnalyzAIRR - AIRR-compliant R package for the analysis of bulk Ig/TCR repertoire datasets
CalcDissimilarity()
Calculation of repertoire dissimilarities
Intervals()
Calculation of the clonal distribution per interval
RepSeqData
RepSeqData
ShannonNorm()
Shannon normalization of repertoires
countFeatures()
Computing the occurrence of any repertoire level
diffExpGroup()
Differential expression analysis
diffExpInd()
Differential expression analysis between two samples
diversityIndices()
Calculation of diversity indices
dropSamples()
Exclude repertoires from a RepSeqExperiment object.
filterCount()
Filtering based on sequence count
filterSequence()
Exclude a sequence from a RepSeqExperiment object.
getPrivate()
Extract private sequences
getProductive()
Extract productive sequences
getPublic()
Extract public sequences
getTopSequences()
Extract the most frequent sequences
getUnproductive()
Extract unproductive sequences
mergeRepSeq()
Merge RepSeqExperiment objects
perturbationScore()
Calculation of the perturbation score
plotColors()
Color palette
plotDiffExp()
Visualization of differential expression in a volcano plot
plotDissimilarity()
Visualization of repertoire dissimilarities
plotDiversity()
Visualization of the diversity indices
plotGeneUsage()
Compare V or J gene distributions
plotIndGeneUsage()
Visualization of the V or J gene usage
plotIndIntervals()
Visualization of the clonal distribution per interval in a single sample
plotIndMap()
Visualization of a repertoire structure through a circular treemap
plotIndStatistics()
Visualization of basic or diversity statistics for one sample
plotIntervals()
Visualization of the clonal distribution per interval
plotPerturbationScore()
Visualization of the perturbation scores
plotRankDistrib()
Visualization of the clonal distribution as a function of the rank
plotRarefaction()
Visualization of the rarefaction curves
plotRenyiIndex()
Visualization of the Renyi index
plotScatter()
Visualization of the inter-repertoire sharing on a scatter plot
plotSpectratyping()
Visualization of CDR3 spectratyping
plotStatScatter()
Visualization of basic statistics in a scatter plot
plotStatistics()
Visualization of basic statistics
plotVenn()
Visualization of the inter-repertoire sharing on an Venn diagram
readAIRRSet()
Building of a RepSeqExperiment object
readFormatSet()
An alternative method for the building of a RepSeqExperiment object
renyiIndex()
Computation of the Renyi index
sampleRepSeqExp()
Down-sampling of repertoires
theme_RepSeq()
A theme for the visualization plots
